oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !haken, a food resembling 'Bushman rice' is also used by Bushmen. (L VIII.-9. 6789 rev., note). That !haken above which a certain fungus grows is given to the old people. (L VIII.-11. 6945 rev.-6954 rev.). !gu !gu !haken !haken
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Various foods and the protection of the rain for a fungus
